data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kangrang, Punnatut, Page, Lawrence M., Beamish, William H. (2012): Schistura tenebrosa, a new species of loach from the Kwai Noi River system, Mae Khlong basin, Thailand (Teleostei: Nemacheilidae). Zootaxa 3586: 69-77, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210087
